original_text: And the children of Israel cried unto the Lord, saying, We have sinned against thee, both because we have forsaken our God, and also served Baalim.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여호와께 부르짖어 이르되 우리가 우리 하나님을 버리고 바알들을 섬김으로 주께 범죄하였나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: And the children of Israel cried unto the Lord
saying, We have sinned against thee
both because we have forsaken our God
